      • deleteCustomer

        public void deleteCustomer​(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        This method deletes the currently selected customer in the table view.
        Parameters:
        event - this handles the deletion of the selected customer from the Observable list and the database. The Lambda is a great tool for shortening code and increasing efficiency. The Lambda made listening for the user to select an option easier.
